Name: Ruby 'Martini'
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon slice on rim.
Review: A sour, citrus-led variation on the Cosmopolitan.
History: Several appearances in episodes of the U.S. hit TV series, Sex And The City , helped this drink become fashionable in 2002, particularly in New York City.  It is thought to have originated at the Wave restaurant in Chicago's W Hotel.
Nutrition: One serving of Ruby 'Martini' contains 207 calories
